text: Soshite kare-ra wa,`goka ga watashi-tachi ni fureru no wa, nan'nichi ka no ma ni suginaidearou.' To iu. Itte yaru ga i. `Anata gata wa, arra to yakusoku o musunda to iu no ka. Sorenara arra wa kesshite hayaku sa renaidearou. Soretomo anata gata wa, arra ni tsuite shiri mo shinai koto o Ro ni shiyou to suru no ka
